coreDetails.name: Joonas Rautiainen
coreDetails.title: Software Developer
coreDetails.bio: Motivated software developer with a strong passion for continuous learning and professional growth. I am always ready to take on new challenges that provide opportunities for development and skill enhancement.

workExperience.description: Full-stack developer with experience across diverse projects. Currently developing an analytics platform using React, TypeScript, and Python. Previously built a full-scale web application with Angular and .NET. Earlier focused on e-commerce, creating custom Shopify themes and integrations for customer projects.
achievements: Developing analytics platform with React, TypeScript, and Python backend
Built full-scale web application using Angular and .NET, my focus on the frontend
Created custom Shopify themes with Liquid templating
Developed Shopify integrations connecting stores with external systems
Worked across multiple technology stacks and project types

workExperience.description: I worked as an assistant teacher in a programming 1 course.
achievements: Supported course delivery and student learning

education.description: I have completed my Bachelor of Science majoring in computer science.

volunteering.description: I was an instructor at Koodaamo, where senior students assist other students with programming courses.
achievements: Supported peer learning and knowledge sharing

volunteering.description: Served as treasurer in various organizations.

projects.name: CroiBot
projects.description: Discord bot designed to help gaming communities with various functionalities and automation.
highlights: Enhanced user experience in Discord servers

projects.name: MaplestoryWebApp
projects.description: Web application for displaying Maplestory character data, exploring different visualization approaches. Built using vibe coding technique with Cursor.
highlights: Built with modern AI-assisted development workflow
